The United States Secretary of Agriculture, Sonny Perdue, has decided to extend the authorization for the Summer Food Service Program. Southern is very happy to announce that, beginning Wednesday, September 16, 2020, we will be able to provide free breakfast and free lunch to all enrolled Southern Public Schools students through, hopefully, December 18, 2020 (the end of first semester).

All enrolled Southern students are eligible for one breakfast and one lunch free per school day, regardless of free or reduced price eligibility. Any charges incurred before September 16, 2020 will need to be paid, including any balances carried over from last year. All balances will remain on Family/Student accounts until January. These free meals will last as long as the Federal funds are available (through December 18, 2020, or possibly before).
